dmca.title: Author complains of reposted story
dmca.body:
To Whom it may concern:

As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. &&512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3)), we are instructed to place you on notice that:

1.	I am the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the story "How I Learned to Love My Buddha Belly".

2.	Utilizing the search query, "Lisa Marie York," at www.google.com, the following search results and links (the "Infringing Material") contain unauthorized copies of my material, this story, or unauthorized derivative works of the my story which infringes the exclusive rights of the Owner:

a. www.theezine.net
b. www.theezine.net/archive/Lifestyle/Women's_Issues/page52.html
c.	articlehub.com/Lifestyle/Women's_Issues/page25.html -
d.	www.articlehub.com
e.	www.theezine.net/archive/Lifestyle/Women's_Issues/How-I-Learned-To-Love-My-Buddha-Belly.html 
f.	www.articlehub.com/authors/Lisa-Marie-York.html - 8k
g.	www.nursezone.com/caring/Yourhealth.asp?articlelD=10833 - 49k - Supplemental Result - Cached
h.	www.articlefeeder.com/0/23710/19/How_I_Learned_ to_Love_My_Buddha_Belly.php?PHPSESSID=cebe2e46ac063ec43a03... - 34k - Supplemental Result - Cached
i. www.fertility-help.com/pregnancy/ orgasms-during-pregnancy.html - 26k -
Supplemental Result - Cached
